article.title: DARPA Awards Mobile Edge Networking to SAIC
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Science Applications International Corporation, McLean, Virginia, is being awarded a $7,949,078 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract. The contractor will provide a flexible smartphone mobile ad-hoc network, associated development, and test framework to ensure successful integration and validation of content-based mobile edge networking technology developer solutions.Â The Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency is the contracting activity.
